definition: to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations

sentences.english: Sometimes a lack of information can lead workers to misperceive that there's preferential treatment, says Mr. Reed.
sentences.chinese: 里德说，有时候信息的缺乏会让员工误以为老板偏心。

sentences.english: Accentric block vibrating mechanism is applied to break the earth for pile sinking pipe to set down.
sentences.chinese: 采用偏心块振动式机构，强迫振动土壤破裂下沉桩管。

sentences.english: Eccentricity and spiral angle have different effects on pressure.
sentences.chinese: 偏心率和螺旋角对油膜压力有不同程度的影响。

sentences.english: Pump inlet pipe diameter changes when level, should choose eccentric different-diameter pipe.
sentences.chinese: 泵的水平入口管变径时，应选用偏心异径管。

sentences.english: Favouritism is certainly a controversial topic.
sentences.chinese: 偏心确实是一个备受争议的话题。

sentences.english: The massage device is mainly composed of a micromotor, an eccentric wheel, etc.
sentences.chinese: 按摩装置主要由微电机和偏心轮等构成。

sentences.english: V-TYPE eccentrically braced frame has well resistant-seismic behavior.
sentences.chinese: 型偏心支撑钢框架具有很好的抗震性能。

sentences.english: The hand folder is easy to operate and adopts a ; ock structure for the eccentricity wheel.
sentences.chinese: 本手动折边机采用偏心轮锁紧结构，操作方便快速。

sentences.english: A robust repetitive controller for roll eccentricity compensation of cold mill is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了用于冷轧机的轧辊偏心补偿的鲁棒重复控制器。

sentences.english: This paper introduces some new developments concerning orbital eccentricity in stratigraphic and paleoclimatic studies.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了偏心率周期在地层和古气候研究方面的新发展。

sentences.english: This pump design operates by means of an eccentric (an off-center section) on the engine camshaft.
sentences.chinese: 这种泵是由发动机凸轮轴上的偏心轮驱动。

sentences.english: Through a big eccentricity will result in a long cycle of this star system movement, the cycle is a finite value.
sentences.chinese: 即使绕转偏心率越大，周期越长，也总会有个周期吧。

sentences.english: The vibration generated by the eccentric weights makes the engine to be balanced state.
sentences.chinese: 偏心重块所产生的振动力使发动机获得平衡的状态。

sentences.english: The static steam force changes linearly with rotor offset in a moderate eccentricity range.
sentences.chinese: 在一定范围内汽流力随偏心量的改变而线性改变。

sentences.english: A vibration motor with a eccentric wheel is also installed in the soft rubber loop.
sentences.chinese: 在软胶套内还装有带偏心轮的振动马达。

sentences.english: The thermal stress of the circular region with an eccentric circular hole is then derived.
sentences.chinese: 求出了具有偏心圆孔的圆形平板的热应力。

definition: to favor a junior/to show favoritism to some juniors
to bare one shoulder/(fig.) to side with/to discriminate in favor of
lit. both the palm and the back of the hand are made of flesh (idiom)/fig. to both be of equal importance/to value both equally
pinyin: shou3 xin1 shou3 bei4 dou1 shi4 rou4

definition: lit. to hold a bowl of water level (idiom)/fig. to be impartial
(of a woman) to be fiercely protective of one's children
to defend sb (a relative, friend or oneself) despite knowing that that person is in the wrong
one's own (child) (i.e. one's child by birth)/biological (parents)/birth (parents)
